--- title: "The Statistical Consulting Training Repository Initiative" --- Note: This page is in development; please check back soon. ## Introduction Welcome to StatCTR; a repository of publicly-contributed and publicly-available training resources for statistical consulting and collaboration. The goal of this website is to provide an open-sourced, community-driven repository for: 1. Training videos 2. Papers and online resources 3. Case studies ## Video Repository ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Submit your video to our website! Everyone can submit their own video to this website via [this form](https://forms.gle/njjVuehXaDEALg4NA). New submissions will require the following: - A YouTube link to their video (see production requirements below) - A script - A set of discussion questions - An acknowledgement of our [contributor code of conduct](codeofconduct.qmd) Video requirements: - Videos must be audible. Closed-captioning should be provided if feasible (Youtube can do this automatically) - Videos must be under 6 minutes in length - Must conform to YouTube's guidelines for all ages - All actors/contributors must consent to public distribution **We wish to encourage creativity!** We only request that the script is constrained to being believable and within the realm of reality for a statistical consultant. We will review all submitted videos and vote on whether to include the video in this repository, based on the following criteria: script quality and content, quality of discussion questions, and video production quality.
